CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
OldVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights ONA report wizard
CurrentVersion.description: A guided workflow will equip analysts with the requisite insights to better diagnose the impact of a change on cross-functional collaboration patterns; the insights surfaced are powered by ONA metrics and are visualized via simple and intuitive network graphs which facilitates the detection of changes in collaboration before/after a large-scale change or transition, such as re-org.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights ONA report wizard
OldVersion.description:
A guided workflow will equip analysts with the
requisite insights to better diagnose the impact of a change on
cross-functional collaboration patterns; the insights surfaced are powered by
ONA metrics and are visualized via simple and intuitive network graphs which
facilitates the detection of changes in collaboration before/after a
large-scale change or transition, such as re-org.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations. These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated this Roadmap to reflect the current status.  We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
OldVersion.description: ,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations. These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated this Roadmap to reflect the current status.  We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
OldVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, the maximum number of policies for each insider risk policy template increases from 5 to 20. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
OldVersion.description: With this update, the maximum number of policies for each insider risk policy template increases from 5 to 20. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Change background while recording on phone
CurrentVersion.description: You can record a video clip with your phone camera and switch your background to any picture you want or make it blurry. With this feature, you can record yourself anywhere and share it with coworkers in your Teams chat or channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Change background while recording on phone
OldVersion.description: You can record a video clip with your phone camera and switch your background to any picture you want or make it blurry. With this feature, you can record yourself anywhere and share it with coworkers in your Teams chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Cross policy remediation actions for enhanced remediation experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the ability for an investigator to resolve every instance of a message across all policies with one Resolve action. Customers with several active policies may see the same message captured as a policy match in more than 1 policy: Instead of an investigator Resolving the same message multiple times, Cross Policy Remediation allows investigators to resolve every instance of that message at once.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Cross policy remediation actions for enhanced remediation experience
OldVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the ability for an investigator to resolve every instance of a message across all policies with one Resolve action. Customers with several active policies may see the same message captured as a policy match in more than 1 policy: Instead of an investigator Resolving the same message multiple times, Cross Policy Remediation allows investigators to resolve every instance of that message at once.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
CurrentVersion.description: ,Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
OldVersion.description: ,Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on desktop in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing or reordering the dashboard cards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on desktop in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings now available on mobile after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: In addition to accessing Copilot in Teams during a meeting on mobile devices (available now), you can now access Copilot in Teams and ask questions about eligible meetings after the meeting ends on mobile devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings now available on mobile after the meeting
OldVersion.description: In addition to accessing Copilot in Teams during a meeting on mobile devices (available now), you can now access Copilot in Teams and ask questions about eligible meetings after the meeting ends on mobile devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.124 - Sidebar Tools App - SpeedTest
CurrentVersion.description:
This adds a SpeedTest answer by default to the Tools app in the Edge sidebar.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-sidebar

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Sidebar Tools App - SpeedTest
OldVersion.description:
This adds a SpeedTest answer by default to the Tools app in the Edge sidebar.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-sidebar

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Files Card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: The feature helps organizations add a view of files which were recently accessed, shared or marked favorite by the user. This file view can be added in the form of card on Viva Connections dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Files Card on Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: The feature helps organizations add a view of files which were recently accessed, shared or marked favorite by the user. This file view can be added in the form of card on Viva Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
OldVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow Block list in GCC, GCCH, and DoD
OldVersion.description: All the Tenant Allow/Block functionality as present in WW environment will be available to admins and security analyst of GCC, GCCH, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage spotlight settings in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Elevate your Connections experience with more control over what appears in the spotlight section. Operators will have the ability to pin items, including hyperlinks from any source, onto the spotlight section and select SharePoint sites as additional content sources to dynamically populate the spotlight section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage spotlight settings in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Elevate your Connections experience with more control over what appears in the spotlight section. Operators will have the ability to pin items, including hyperlinks from any source, onto the spotlight section and select SharePoint sites as additional content sources to dynamically populate the spotlight section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
OldVersion.description: Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows – Easier discoverability of Workflows templates
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to discover which Workflows template was used when they receive a Workflows card in chats and channels. Teams Workflow cards posted from a template will now include a link to the template used. Users will be able to open the workflow template and create their own automated Teams workflows to save them time when completing routine tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows – Easier discoverability of Workflows templates
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to discover which Workflows template was used when they receive a Workflows card in chats and channels. Teams Workflow cards posted from a template will now include a link to the template used. Users will be able to open the workflow template and create their own automated Teams workflows to save them time when completing routine tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Deploy DMG and unmanaged PKG apps enhancement for macOS
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to use "available" assignment type for DMG and unmanaged PKG app types for macOS. This enables end users to browse and install these apps in the Mac Company Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Meeting cost and quality insights
CurrentVersion.description: Leaders will have a new report showing how their team invests time in meetings and opportunities to review meetings to reclaim time. Individuals will have improved meeting review insights in the Viva Insights app and new in-line nudges in Outlook to encourage them to be thoughtful when creating new high-cost meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
OldVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New RSVP settings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Two new settings to improve the user experience when responding to meeting invitations: (1) do not delete invitation email after RSVPing and (2) auto-decline if the attendee's calendar shows as busy. These features will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Enable deletion of non-empty folders in SharePoint for Microsoft 365 and OneDrive for Business when under a retention policy
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, end users can delete non-empty document library folders containing many files on a site managed by a retention policy. Additionally, this feature ensures that folders covered under a Retention policy and that have been deleted don’t reappear for users who sync a document library offline using OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for Auto-Expanding Archives
CurrentVersion.description: ,Auto-Expanding Archives are a component that provides customers the ability to grow their mailbox archives over the normal 100 GB quota limit.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Default classification for content matching trainable classifiers (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: In the Microsoft Purview compliance center, admins can view items that match trainable classifiers in Content explorer without first needing to create a policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Default classification for content matching trainable classifiers (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: In the Microsoft Purview compliance center, admins can view items that match trainable classifiers in Content explorer without first needing to create a policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
OldVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings
